sqlMap.select: SELECT item.ITEM_CODE AS itemCode, item.ITEM_GROUP_CODE AS itemGroupCode, item.ITEM_NAME AS itemName, item.ITEM_SIZE AS itemSize, item.ITEM_SIZE_YN AS itemSizeYn, stock.STOCK_MARKET_PRICE AS itemMarketPrice, stock.STOCK_SELL_PRICE AS itemSellPrice, stock.STOCK_PURCHASE_PRICE AS itemPurchasePrice, item.ITEM_PIC_PATH AS itemPicPath, item.ITEM_PIC_SAVENAME AS itemPicSavename, item.ITEM_SCORE AS itemScore, item.ITEM_SUMMARY_INFO AS itemSummaryInfo, item.ITEM_DETAIL_INFO AS itemDetailInfo, item.ITEM_INGREDIENT AS itemIngredient, item.ITEM_HOW_TO_USE AS itemHowToUse, item.ITEM_SELL_MAXNUM AS itemSellMaxnum, stock.STOCK_AMOUNT AS itemStockAmount, item.ITEM_STATUS AS itemStatus, brand.BRAND_NAME AS brandName, stock.STOCK_CODE AS stockCode FROM ITEM item, BRAND brand, ITEM_STOCK stock WHERE item.BRAND_CODE = brand.BRAND_CODE AND item.ITEM_CODE = stock.ITEM_CODE AND item.ITEM_GROUP_CODE=#itemGroupCode#
